I have played this game for about 5+ years (10+ years cs in general) and from being the most competitive skill-based 5v5 shooter it went to pure garbage. It was playable until battle royal boom happened and it lost huge portion of its playerbase. After that its only downhill.
First - this silly BR mode that nobody asked for - low fps, bad optimization (could not imagine something optimized worse than PUBG until BR update for csgo came out) and this slow, skinny, camping-style gameplay. CS:GO is a slow game, it does not allow any advanced movement and fast rotations required for a BR game, it is about team tactics, economy, map knowledge, precise aim and properly utilizing shooting mechanics.
Second - this game is unplayable unless you have minimum of 2 people to play with. I have played on supreme and global for a very long time and almost in every game I get team with trolls, leavers, russians and griefers - overall people not interested in playing the objective. You can only imagine whats going on on lower ranks.
Third - the amount of hackers. Nothing has ever helped this problem and after the majority of players left this game I get a hacker once in two games (at minimum). You wont believe me but this is so easy to fix! Just make the game cost 30$ or more and the amount of hackers will drop significantly. Most people who hack just buy cheap accounts for like 1-5$ and don't really care of getting banned. Instead valve constantly places this game for sale so even more hackers can get cheap accounts in the future
Now the added skins for players so some pathetic losers can feel better for themselves by buying skins and trying to blend with map textures. Does not look like a big problem but on high ranks its all about who lands the headshot or AWP shot first and you going to lose those precious milliseconds before making a shot just to distinguish your opponent the wall or create or whatever....
There is no reason to buy this game anymore.
